00020 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 // Function: SWDesignEditor()
00022 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 SWDesignEditor::SWDesignEditor(QWidget *parent, QWidget* parentWnd, LibraryInterface* libHandler,
00024                                QSharedPointer<Component> component) :
00025     TabDocument(parent, DOC_PROTECTION_SUPPORT), libHandler_(libHandler), component_(component),
00026     platformMapping_(VLNV::COMPONENT, libHandler, parentWnd, this),
00027     endpointGroup_(tr("Mapped Endpoints"), this), endpointList_(&endpointGroup_),
00028     addButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/add.png"), QString(), this),
00029     removeButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/remove.png"), QString(), this),
00030     endpointType_(VLNV::COMPONENT, libHandler, parentWnd, &endpointGroup_),
00031     linkedAppType_(VLNV::COMPONENT, libHandler, parentWnd, &endpointGroup_),
00032     previewBox_(libHandler)
00033 {
00034     // Create the widgets.
00035     endpointList_.setFixedWidth(200);
00036 
00037     platformMapping_.setTitle(tr("Mapped Platform"));
00038     endpointType_.setTitle(tr("Endpoints"));
00039     linkedAppType_.setTitle(tr("Fixed Application (optional)"));
00040 
00041     QVBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QVBoxLayout();
00042     buttonLayout->addWidget(&addButton_);
00043     buttonLayout->addWidget(&removeButton_);
00044     buttonLayout->addStretch(1);
00045 
00046     QGridLayout* endpointLayout = new QGridLayout(&endpointGroup_);
00047     endpointLayout->addWidget(&endpointList_, 0, 0, 2, 1);
00048     endpointLayout->addLayout(buttonLayout, 0, 1, 2, 1);
00049     endpointLayout->addWidget(&endpointType_, 0, 2, 1, 1);
00050     endpointLayout->addWidget(&linkedAppType_, 1, 2, 1, 1);
00051 
00052     QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00053     layout->addWidget(&platformMapping_, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00054     layout->addWidget(&endpointGroup_, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00055     layout->addWidget(&previewBox_, 0, 1, 2, 1);
00056     layout->setRowStretch(2, 1);
00057 
00058     // Set endpoint and application VLNV editor disabled by default.
00059     endpointType_.setEnabled(false);
00060     linkedAppType_.setEnabled(false);
00061 
00062     // Connect signals.
00063     connect(&platformMapping_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00064 
00065     connect(&addButton_, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(addEndpointsMapping()));
00066     connect(&removeButton_, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(removeEndpointsMapping()));
00067     connect(&endpointType_, SIGNAL(vlnvEdited()), this, SLOT(updateListItem()));
00068     connect(&endpointList_, SIGNAL(currentItemChanged(QListWidgetItem*, QListWidgetItem*)),
00069         this, SLOT(onListItemChanged(QListWidgetItem*, QListWidgetItem*)));
00070 
00071     connect(&endpointType_, SIGNAL(vlnvEdited()), this, SLOT(updateData()));
00072     connect(&linkedAppType_, SIGNAL(vlnvEdited()), this, SLOT(updateData()));
00073 
00074     // Read the existing SW design.
00075     VLNV designVLNV = component_->getHierRef("kts_sw_ref");
00076 
00077     if (libHandler_->contains(designVLNV))
00078     {
00079         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = libHandler_->getModel(designVLNV);
00080         QSharedPointer<Design> design = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00081         QMap<QString, EndpointsMappingData*> endpointMap;
00082 
00083         foreach (Design::ComponentInstance const& instance, design->getComponentInstances())
00084         {
00085             // Retrieve the component model.
00086             QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = libHandler_->getModel(instance.componentRef);
00087             QSharedPointer<Component> comp = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00088 
00089             if (comp == 0)
00090             {
00091                 //                 emit errorMessage(tr("The component %1 was not found in the library").arg(
00092                 //                                   instance.componentRef.name()).arg(design->getVlnv()->name()));
00093                 continue;
00094             }
00095 
00096             // Create the correct graphics item based on the SW type.
00097             switch (comp->getComponentSWType())
00098             {
00099             case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS:
00100                 {
00101                     EndpointsMappingData data;
00102                     data.endpointsVLNV = instance.componentRef;
00103                     endpointsMappingDatas_.push_back(data);
00104 
00105                     QListWidgetItem* item = new QListWidgetItem(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/endpoints.png"),
00106                         data.endpointsVLNV.getVendor() + ":" +
00107                         data.endpointsVLNV.getLibrary() + "\n" +
00108                         data.endpointsVLNV.getName() + ":" +
00109                         data.endpointsVLNV.getVersion());
00110                     item->setSizeHint(QSize(item->sizeHint().width(), 35));
00111                     endpointList_.addItem(item);
00112                     endpointMap.insert(instance.instanceName, &endpointsMappingDatas_.back());
00113                     break;
00114                 }
00115 
00116             case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_APPLICATION:
00117                 {
00118                     // Find the corresponding interconnection to find the linked program entity.
00119                     int connIndex = 0;
00120 
00121                     for (; connIndex < design->getInterconnections().size(); ++connIndex)
00122                     {
00123                         if (design->getInterconnections().at(connIndex).interface2.componentRef ==
00124                             instance.instanceName)
00125                         {
00126                             break;
00127                         }
00128                     }
00129 
00130                     if (connIndex == design->getInterconnections().size())
00131                     {
00132                         // TODO: Error message to the output window.
00133                         continue;
00134                     }
00135 
00136                     Design::Interconnection const& conn = design->getInterconnections().at(connIndex);
00137                     Q_ASSERT(conn.interface2.componentRef == instance.instanceName);
00138                     endpointMap.value(conn.interface1.componentRef)->linkedAppVLNV = instance.componentRef;
00139                     break;
00140                 }
00141 
00142             case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM:
00143                 {
00144                     platformMapping_.setVLNV(instance.componentRef);
00145                     break;
00146                 }
00147             }
00148         }
00149 
00150         // Select the first endpoint definition if found.
00151         if (endpointList_.count() > 0)
00152         {
00153             endpointList_.setCurrentItem(endpointList_.item(0));
00154         }
00155     }
00156 
00157     setModified(false);
00158 
00159     // Set the document name and type.
00160     VLNV const* vlnv = component_->getVlnv();
00161     setDocumentName(vlnv->getName() + " (" + vlnv->getVersion() + ")");
00162     setDocumentType(tr("SW Design"));
00163 
00164     previewBox_.setComponent(*component_->getVlnv());
00165 
00166     // Open in unlocked mode by default only if the version is draft.
00167     setProtection(vlnv->getVersion() != "draft");
00168 }

00185 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

00189 {
00190     return *component_->getVlnv();
00191 }

00193 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00194 // Function: save()
00195 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00196 bool SWDesignEditor::save()
00197 {
00198     // The mapped platform must be either totally empty or valid.
00199     if (!platformMapping_.isEmpty() && !platformMapping_.isValid())
00200     {
00201         return false;
00202     }
00203 
00204     // Check all mapped endpoints that their endpoints VLNV is valid and
00205     // linked application is either empty or valid.
00206     for (int i = 0; i < endpointsMappingDatas_.size(); ++i)
00207     {
00208         EndpointsMappingData const& data = endpointsMappingDatas_[i];
00209 
00210         if (!data.endpointsVLNV.isValid())
00211         {
00212             return false;
00213         }
00214 
00215         if (!data.linkedAppVLNV.isEmpty() && !data.linkedAppVLNV.isValid())
00216         {
00217             return false;
00218         }
00219     }
00220 
00221     QSharedPointer<Design> design(new Design(component_->getHierRef("kts_sw_ref")));
00222 
00223     QList<Design::ComponentInstance> instances;
00224     QList<Design::Interconnection> interconnections;
00225 
00226     // Add the platform component item to the instance list if set.
00227     if (platformMapping_.isValid())
00228     {
00229         Design::ComponentInstance instance(platformMapping_.getVLNV().getName().remove(".comp"),
00230                                            QString(), QString(), platformMapping_.getVLNV(), QPointF());
00231         instances.append(instance);
00232     }
00233 
00234     for (int i = 0; i < endpointsMappingDatas_.size(); ++i)
00235     {
00236         EndpointsMappingData const& data = endpointsMappingDatas_[i];
00237 
00238         Design::ComponentInstance instance(data.endpointsVLNV.getName().remove(".comp"),
00239             QString(), QString(), data.endpointsVLNV, QPointF());
00240         instances.append(instance);
00241 
00242         // Save the linked application if found.
00243         if (data.linkedAppVLNV.isValid())
00244         {
00245             Design::ComponentInstance appInstance(data.linkedAppVLNV.getName().remove(".comp"),
00246                 QString(), QString(), data.linkedAppVLNV, QPointF());
00247             instances.append(appInstance);
00248 
00249             // Add the applink interconnection.
00250             Design::Interface iface1(instance.instanceName, "app_link");
00251             Design::Interface iface2(appInstance.instanceName, "app_link");
00252             interconnections.append(Design::Interconnection(instance.instanceName + "_link_" + appInstance.instanceName,
00253                 iface1, iface2, QList<QPointF>()));
00254         }
00255     }
00256 
00257     design->setComponentInstances(instances);
00258     design->setInterconnections(interconnections);
00259 
00260     libHandler_->writeModelToFile(design);
00261 
00262     // Update the preview.
00263     previewBox_.setComponent(*component_->getVlnv());
00264 
00265     return TabDocument::save();
00266 }

00277 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00278 // Function: addEndpointsMapping()
00279 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00280 void SWDesignEditor::addEndpointsMapping()
00281 {
00282     // Create a new data entry.
00283     endpointsMappingDatas_.push_back(EndpointsMappingData());
00284 
00285     // Create a list widget item and select it.
00286     QListWidgetItem* item = new QListWidgetItem(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/endpoints.png"),
00287         tr("<Vendor>:<Library>\n<Name:>:<Version>"));
00288     item->setSizeHint(QSize(item->sizeHint().width(), 35));
00289     item->setTextColor(Qt::red);
00290     endpointList_.addItem(item);
00291     endpointList_.setCurrentItem(item);
00292 
00293     // Enable all related widgets.
00294     removeButton_.setEnabled(true);
00295     endpointType_.setEnabled(true);
00296     linkedAppType_.setEnabled(true);
00297 
00298     emit contentChanged();
00299 }
00300 
00301 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00302 // Function: removeEndpointsMapping()
00303 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00304 void SWDesignEditor::removeEndpointsMapping()
00305 {
00306     if (endpointList_.currentItem() != 0)
00307     {
00308         // Remove the data entry and the item.
00309         int index = endpointList_.currentRow();
00310         endpointList_.takeItem(endpointList_.currentRow());
00311         endpointsMappingDatas_.remove(index);
00312 
00313         // Disable the remove button and VLNV editors if there are no more list items.
00314         if (endpointList_.count() == 0)
00315         {
00316             removeButton_.setEnabled(false);
00317             endpointType_.setEnabled(false);
00318             linkedAppType_.setEnabled(false);
00319         }
00320 
00321         emit contentChanged();
00322     }
00323 }
00324 
00325 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00326 // Function: updateListItem()
00327 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00328 void SWDesignEditor::updateListItem()
00329 {
00330     if (endpointList_.currentItem() != 0)
00331     {
00332         QListWidgetItem* item = endpointList_.currentItem();
00333 
00334         // Update the item's text.
00335         QString vendor = "<Vendor>";
00336         QString library = "<Library>";
00337         QString name = "<Name>";
00338         QString version = "<Version>";
00339 
00340         VLNV vlnv = endpointType_.getVLNV();
00341 
00342         if (!vlnv.getVendor().isEmpty())
00343         {
00344             vendor = vlnv.getVendor();
00345         }
00346 
00347         if (!vlnv.getLibrary().isEmpty())
00348         {
00349             library = vlnv.getLibrary();
00350         }
00351 
00352         if (!vlnv.getName().isEmpty())
00353         {
00354             name = vlnv.getName();
00355         }
00356 
00357         if (!vlnv.getVersion().isEmpty())
00358         {
00359             version = vlnv.getVersion();
00360         }
00361 
00362         item->setText(vendor + ":" + library + "\n" + name + ":" + version);
00363 
00364         // Update the item's color based on the validity of the VLNV.
00365         if (vlnv.isValid())
00366         {
00367             item->setTextColor(Qt::black);
00368         }
00369         else
00370         {
00371             item->setTextColor(Qt::red);
00372         }
00373     }
00374 }
00375 
00376 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00377 // Function: updateData()
00378 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00379 void SWDesignEditor::updateData()
00380 {
00381     QListWidgetItem* item = endpointList_.currentItem();
00382 
00383     if (item != 0)
00384     {
00385         endpointsMappingDatas_[endpointList_.row(item)].endpointsVLNV = endpointType_.getVLNV();
00386         endpointsMappingDatas_[endpointList_.row(item)].linkedAppVLNV = linkedAppType_.getVLNV();
00387         emit contentChanged();
00388     }
00389 }
00390 
00391 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00392 // Function: onListItemChanged()
00393 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00394 void SWDesignEditor::onListItemChanged(QListWidgetItem* cur, QListWidgetItem*)
00395 {
00396     // If there is no new selection, empty and disable the VLNV editors.
00397     if (cur == 0)
00398     {
00399         endpointType_.setVLNV(VLNV());
00400         endpointType_.setEnabled(false);
00401 
00402         linkedAppType_.setEnabled(false);
00403         linkedAppType_.setVLNV(VLNV());
00404     }
00405     else
00406     {
00407         // If the selection was valid, update the editors with the matching VLNVs.
00408         int row = endpointList_.row(cur);
00409 
00410         endpointType_.setVLNV(endpointsMappingDatas_[row].endpointsVLNV);
00411         endpointType_.setEnabled(true);
00412 
00413         linkedAppType_.setVLNV(endpointsMappingDatas_[row].linkedAppVLNV);
00414         linkedAppType_.setEnabled(true);
00415     }
00416 }
